problem_text_cn: 如图,△ABC中,∠BAC=90°,AC=12,AB=10,D是AC上一个动点,以AD为直径的⊙O交BD于E,则线段CE的最小值是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠BAC = N_0, AC = N_1, AB = N_2, D is a moving point on AC, and ⊙O with AD as the diameter intersects BD to E, then the minimum value of line segment CE is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图,连接AE,则∠AED=∠BEA=90°,∴点E在以AB为直径的⊙Q上,∵AB=10,∴QA=QB=5,当点Q、E、C三点共线时,QE+CE=CQ(最短),而QE长度不变,故此时CE最小,∵AC=12,∴QC=√{AQ^{2}+AC^{2}}=13,∴CE=QC-QE=13-5=8,故选:D．
